title: Daisy and Pearl Lowe on surviving a difficult year: 'I couldn't have got through it without my mum'
text:
After a death in the family and a shock exit from Strictly Come Dancing, Daisy Lowe fell into a spiral of sadness and lost her confidence. But thanks to the endless support of her mum, Pearl, she now knows what makes her truly happy

It's a sunny afternoon in an 18th-century pub on the river Thames in west London, and the fashion/interior designer Pearl Lowe and her model daughter Daisy are talking family, fashion, handbags, heartache, parenthood, the perfect partner and breakdowns.

They share the same graceful, feline features, the same ready laugh and, of course, both are darlings of the fashion world. Pearl, 49, is wearing a vintage dress from her successful eponymous label, and Daisy, 30,...
description: After a death in the family and a shock exit from Strictly Come Dancing, Daisy Lowe fell into a spiral of sadness and lost her confidence.
